p: TCs identified were confirmed with Bayesian Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) inference, as implemented in BEAST v1.8.2 [ 26]. The temporal signal of the TCs datasets was evaluated with TempEst [ 27]. The uncorrelated log-normal relaxed molecular clock with a discretized GTR substitution model and the Bayesian Skygrid coalescent model were used [ 28]. Three separate MCMC chains were run for at least 100 million generations. Convergence was determined with Tracer using a burn-in of 10% ( http://beast.bio.ed.ac.uk/Tracer). The maximum clade credibility (MCC) tree was constructed with TreeAnnotator after discarding the burn-in, and visualized with FigTree v1.4.2 ( http://tree.bio.ed.ac.uk).
